sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { useRef, useState } from 'react'
import  { Box , Grid, Button, TextField } from '@mui/material'
import { ColorSelect } from './ColorSelect'
import { defaultGraphScheme, GraphScheme } from '../tools/graphtools'


type ConfigurationProps = {
    onChange? : (graphScheme: GraphScheme) => void
}

export const Configuration = ( { onChange }: ConfigurationProps ) => {
    const geneNodeRef = useRef()
    const geneFontRef = useRef()
    const organNodeRef = useRef()
    const organFontRef = useRef()
    const relValRef = useRef<HTMLInputElement>(null)
    const sizeRef = useRef<HTMLInputElement>(null)
    const [graphScheme, setGraphScheme] = useState(defaultGraphScheme)

    const handleApplyClick = () => {
        console.log('Apply Click')
        const _graphScheme : GraphScheme = {
            geneNode: 'Blue',
            geneFont: 'White',
            organNode: 'Red',
            organFont: 'White',
            syndromeNode: 'Yellow',
            syndromeFont: 'Black', 
            relVal: 1,
            size: 1
        }

        if (onChange) { _graphScheme  }
    }
    
    return (
        <Box >
        <Grid container m={1} rowSpacing={1} columnSpacing={1}>
            <Grid item xs={12}   >
                <Box color='primary.main' >
                    Gene
                </Box>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={6} >
                <Box  >
                    <ColorSelect inputRef={geneNodeRef} label='Node' select={graphScheme.geneNode}/>
                </Box>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={6} >
                <Box  >
                    <ColorSelect inputRef={geneFontRef} label='Font' select={graphScheme.geneFont}/>
                </Box>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} >
                <Box color='primary.main' >
                    Organ 
                </Box>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={6} >
                <Box  >
                    <ColorSelect inputRef={organNodeRef} label='Node' select={graphScheme.organNode}/>
                </Box>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={6} >
                <Box  >
                    <ColorSelect inputRef={organFontRef} label='Font' select={graphScheme.organFont}/>
                </Box>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} >
                <Box color='primary.main' >
                    Nodes & Edges
                </Box>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={6} >
                <Box  >
                    <TextField inputRef={relValRef} label='RelVal' variant='standard' type='number' defaultValue={graphScheme.relVal} />
                </Box>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={6} >
                <Box>
                    <TextField inputRef={sizeRef}  label='Size' variant='standard' type='number' defaultValue={graphScheme.size}/>
                </Box>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={4} >
                <Box>
                </Box>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={4} >
                <Box >
                    <Button variant='outlined'>Reset</Button>  
                </Box>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={4} >
                <Box>
                    <Button 
                        variant='outlined'
                        onClick={handleApplyClick}
                     >Apply</Button>  
                </Box>
            </Grid>
        </Grid>
    </Box>
    )
}
